name: Create new candidates in BoondManager from new Typeform responses
description:
This template creates new candidates in BoondManager based on new responses in Typeform.

The template expects your Typeform to have these fields:
1) First name as short text
2) Last name as short text
3) Email as email
4) Phone number as phone number
5) Address as short text
6) Post code as short text
7) Town as short text
8) Country as short text (entered as full country name in French)
